resources.string: We just need your email to send you the password reset link

Vision Epitomize CSE graduate to carve a niche globally in the field of computer science to excel in the world of technology and automation by imparting sustainable and inclusive knowledge.
Mission M1: To educate students in a sanguine and creative environment through world-class Pedagogy and research experience M2: Enhancing the knowledge in the recent technology by conducting continuing Education programs, organizing and participating in various technical events M3: Impart Skills in the field of CSE and its related areas with a focus on developing the required competencies and virtues to meet the requirement of the Industries. M4: Ensure Quality research to serve the needs of industry, Government and society. M5 : Import the Knowledge to student for acquiring skills in entrepreneurship, Consultancy and develop sustainability to changing environment
